item.title: F-22 performs first-ever air-to-air 'kill' - analysis
item.description: The F-22 Raptor was used to shoot down a balloon that made its way across the continental United States from China.

item.title: Cold, hunger, despair grip homeless as Turkey-Syria earthquake toll passes 19,000
item.description: Cold, hunger and despair gripped hundreds of thousands of people left homeless after the earthquakes that struck Turkey and Syria three days ago as the death toll passed 19,000 on Thursday.

item.title: Huge haul of cocaine floating at sea seized
item.description: More than 3 tons of cocaine floating in the ocean have been seized by authorities in New Zealand in one of the country's single biggest drugs busts.

item.title: Is Apple paying any attention to the ChatGPT AI arms race?
item.description: The biggest names in tech are all-in on generative AI, and Apple still can't seem to get Siri right.

item.title: RPI dorm resident assistants want to unionize
item.description: The resident assistants who work in the dorms say their working conditions vary greatly and they want a say in policies about how to handle emergencies.
